categories.title: Recent ElizaOS GitHub Pull Requests Summary

content.text: Several bug fixes were implemented in recent pull requests. PR #4385 addressed an import issue for the derive key provider. PR #4396 fixed an undefined error that was occurring with local LLM. PR #4395 resolved an issue with agent deletion. PR #4389 improved error handling for situations where there is no space left on disk, providing clearer messages to users.

New features were added to enhance functionality and development experience. PR #4394 implemented logging for model and plugin names when a model is used. PR #4390 introduced scopable knowledge capabilities. PR #4388 added functionality to rebuild core and plugin-bootstrap when in a mono repo context with the dev command. PR #4387 added a .env.example file in the project-starter to improve developer onboarding.

The codebase underwent some cleanup and UI improvements. PR #4393 implemented a cleaner UI with other minor UI enhancements. Additionally, two pull requests (PR #4399 and PR #4386) focused on removing the plugin EVM from the package JSON and monorepo respectively.

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several pull requests have been submitted to the elizaOS/eliza repository, focusing on various improvements and features:

1. Scopable Knowledge: PR #4390 and PR #4391 by lalalune introduce scopable knowledge functionality, allowing for more targeted information management within the system.

2. Automated Trading: PR #4397 by Freytes adds Autofun Buy and Sell capabilities through contracts, enhancing the platform's trading functionality.

3. Repository Cleanup: PR #4386 by 0xbbjoker removes the plugin EVM from the monorepo, streamlining the codebase.

4. UI Enhancements: PR #4393 by wtfsayo implements a cleaner user interface with various minor improvements for better user experience.

Current cryptocurrency prices:

- WETH (Wrapped Ethereum) is trading at $1,799.31
- SOL (Solana) is trading at $147.82

Between April 29-30, 2025, the elizaos/eliza repository saw significant activity with 14 new pull requests, of which 11 were successfully merged. During this period, no new issues were reported. The repository had 8 active contributors working on these changes.
sources: text: From 2025-04-29 to 2025-04-30, elizaos/eliza had 14 new PRs (11 merged), 0 new issues, and 8 active contributors.

categories.title: Import Error: generateText Not Exported from @elizaos/core

content.text: Issue #4046 reports a SyntaxError when trying to import the 'generateText' function from the '@elizaos/core' module. The error message indicates that the requested module does not provide an export with that name. This suggests either the function name has changed, the import path is incorrect, or the function is no longer available in the specified module.

The provided source only mentions 'Top contributors for elizaOS/eliza' without providing any specific details about who these contributors are or their contributions.
